topics.body: This morning me a few friends were out snooping in the storage rooms of our college. Then we found a couple of useless junk and a few cobbled together props. One of them was an engineer's hard hat painted gold and has the brush part of a plastic broom glued to it. Basically looks like a piece of Roman legionary helmet. I love my college.
